an5.136:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto oparajjam pattheti.
an5.136:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto ubhato sujato hoti matito ca pitito ca, samsuddhagahaniko, yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena;
an5.136:1.4: abhirupo hoti dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato;
an5.136:1.7: pandito hoti viyatto medhavi patibalo atitanagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetum.
an5.136:2.2: ‘aham khomhi ubhato sujato matito ca pitito ca, samsuddhagahaniko, yava sattama pitamahayuga akkhitto anupakkuttho jativadena.
an5.136:2.4: Aham khomhi abhirupo dassaniyo pasadiko paramaya vannapokkharataya samannagato.
an5.136:2.10: Aham khomhi pandito viyatto medhavi patibalo atitanagatapaccuppanne atthe cintetum.
an5.136:2.12: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno khattiyassa muddhavasittassa jettho putto oparajjam pattheti.
an5.136:3.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu asavanam khayam pattheti.
an5.136:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu silava hoti …pe… samadaya sikkhati sikkhapadesu;
an5.136:3.6: araddhaviriyo viharati akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu;
an5.136:3.7: pannava hoti, udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an5.136:4.2: ‘aham khomhi silava, patimokkhasamvarasamvuto viharami acaragocarasampanno anumattesu vajjesu bhayadassavi, samadaya sikkhami sikkhapadesu.
an5.136:4.4: Aham khomhi bahussuto sutadharo sutasannicayo, ye te dhamma adikalyana majjhekalyana pariyosanakalyana sattham sabyanjanam kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam abhivadanti, tatharupa me dhamma bahussuta honti dhata vacasa paricita manasanupekkhita ditthiya suppatividdha.
an5.136:4.8: Aham khomhi araddhaviriyo viharami akusalanam dhammanam pahanaya, kusalanam dhammanam upasampadaya, thamava dalhaparakkamo anikkhittadhuro kusalesu dhammesu.
an5.136:4.10: Aham khomhi pannava udayatthagaminiya pannaya samannagato ariyaya nibbedhikaya samma dukkhakkhayagaminiya.
an5.136:4.12: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu asavanam khayam pattheti”ti.
